title: Action-Based Mathematics Pedagogy Workshop for Real-Time Blended Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of Basic Educational Theories, Mathematics Curriculum Content, and Digital Device Proficiency
context.additional_context: Training program for pre-service/in-service teachers to design and implement effective mathematics instruction in real-time blended learning environments

learning_goals: Learners can design and apply at least three strategies to facilitate interaction between in-person/online learners in real-time blended learning environments.
Learners can improve classroom layouts, equipment, and communication methods in math classes using action-based research methodologies.
Learners can analyze learner engagement and performance in real-time through project-based assessments and incorporate findings into instructional design.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
